infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to camera to take photos for your memories.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to photo library to select photos and videos for your memories.

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you share them with your friends.
plugins.cameraPermission: The app accesses your camera to let you take photos for your memories.
